metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8692 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
The jpc_dec_process_siz function in libjasper/jpc/jpc_dec.c in JasPer before 1.900.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero error and application crash) via a crafted YRsiz value in a BMP image to the imginfo command.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8692` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.4
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.4
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> same patch as CVE-2016-8691 fixed in (1.900.1-debian1-2.4+deb8u2)

criterions.comment: jasper package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-14ubuntu3.4').
